remarks: Reverse distributive law for (right vector space) scalar product of functionals.  (Contributed by NM, 21-Oct-2014.)
statement:
lfldi.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lfldi.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lfldi.k $e |- K = ( Base ` R ) $.
lfldi.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` R ) $.
lfldi.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
lfldi.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) $.
lfldi.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
lfldi.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. K ) $.
lfldi2.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. K ) $.
lfldi2.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.
lflvsdi2a $p |- ( ph -> ( G oF .x. ( V X. { ( X .+ Y ) } ) ) = ( ( G oF .x. ( V X. { X } ) ) oF .+ ( G oF .x. ( V X. { Y } ) ) ) ) $.
